analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fa335fd302b0e3aa5413ea02a76f43848f3e42e.sol#90) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fa335fd302b0e3aa5413ea02a76f43848f3e42e.sol#116-123)

VIRTUALTALK.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fa335fd302b0e3aa5413ea02a76f43848f3e42e.sol#209-210) shadows:
	- VIRTUALTALKToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fa335fd302b0e3aa5413ea02a76f43848f3e42e.sol#19-21)

Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fa335fd302b0e3aa5413ea02a76f43848f3e42e.sol#90)
VIRTUALTALK.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fa335fd302b0e3aa5413ea02a76f43848f3e42e.sol#209-210)
VIRTUALTALKToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/43/0x9fa335fd302b0e3aa5413ea02a76f43848f3e42e.sol#19-21)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/43/0x9fa335fd302b0e3aa5413ea02a76f43848f3e42e.sol:
